about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm Leenard Benn P. Broca  a detail-oriented front-end developer with 2 years of experience, skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, including frameworks like React and Vue.js. I specialize in translating design concepts into responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
about.secondary: My hobbies in life are  about watching videos and playing basketball.

projects.title: Middleman
projects.description: Middleman is built on Ruby and uses the RubyGems package manager for installation. These are usually pre-installed on Mac OS X and Linux.

projects.title: Developer Resources
projects.description: This is a collection of resources for Frontend development Most of the resources are free but we also included paid resources.

projects.title: URL Shortening Landing Page
projects.description: This project could also be a good way to get your feet wet with JS libraries/frameworks like React or Vue. Also, if the user refreshes their browser, try using localStorage to save the list of shortened links.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
